tracer.paths

Class Superellipse

  • java.lang.Object
    • tracer.paths.Path
      • tracer.paths.Superellipse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants, Drawable

    public class Superellipse
extends Path
    A more generalized version of the ellipse.

    More info on the superellipse .
    Author:
    James Morrow [jamesmorrowdesign.com]

    • Constructor Detail

      • Superellipse

        public Superellipse(Point cen,
                    float xRadius,
                    float yRadius,
                    float n)
        Parameters:
        cen - the center of the path
        xRadius - half the width
        yRadius - half the height
        n - controls the amount of pinching (smaller values give more pinching)

      • Superellipse

        Parameters:

        r - The radius of the path.

                    float ceny,
                    float xRadius,
                    float yRadius,
                    float n)
        Parameters:
        cenx - the center x-coordinate
        ceny - the center y-coordinate
        xRadius - half the width
        yRadius - half the height
        n - controls the amount of pinching (smaller values give more pinching)
        sampleCount - the number of sample points

        public int getGapCount()

      • getGap

        public float getGap(int i)
        Description copied from class: Path
        Gives the ith discontinuity in the Path as a 1D coordinate. Gaps should be unique and indexed in ascending order. In other words, this must hold true: gap(i) < gap(i+1) as i varies from 0 to getGapCount()-1. Gives -1 if the index is valid.
        Specified by:
        getGap in class Path
        Parameters:
        i - The index
        Returns:
        The ith discontinuity as a value within [0, 1)
